Alas, the end of term has arrived, and for many of us this means heading home and getting a good week or two of rest.</p>

For others though, this means that it is carolling time!</p>

The dates we have for carolling this year are:</p>

SATURDAY 1st DECEMBER </strong>- Foodies Christmas festival at the Edinburgh International Conference Centre, Morrison St. This is a ticketed event with lots of food and whisky samples... Meet at 11.15am.</em></h6>
MONDAY 3rd DECEMBER</strong> - EUMS Christmas party! 6.30pm at the Reid Concert Hall... </em>Find the Facebook event here</a>.</h6>
TUESDAY 4th DECEMBER</strong> - Switching on the lights at the </em>Southside Community Centre on Nicolson Street at 5.50pm. Mulled wine action included!</em></h6>
THURSDAY 6th DECEMBER</strong> - 7pm for carols at the Pear Tree and Counting House, an old favourite for a brisk evening!</em></h6>
THURSDAY 13th DECEMBER</strong> - Carolling at Stockbridge House, Cheyne Street for LifeCare (Edinburgh) Ltd. </em></h6>
SUNDAY 16th DECEMBER</strong> - Princes Street Mall at 11.30am. Hop along before you do your holiday shopping!</em></h6>
To find out further details of events, email our Community Manager at community@eums.org.uk</a>...

For those of you with ongoing exams, best of luck, and for all Musocers: see you next semester!</p>

Whether you are in Edinburgh or not, the Edinburgh University Music Society wishes you a very Merry Christmas!</strong></em></h5>
